name: Chemical Horror
description:
You have created a creature. You can create this creature as you please, but be careful. Remember that it's alive.

You have DNA points, you can waste them on parts of your creature.

You can open a To do List ("E") to know what to do.

After you waste them all, you get to be in sandbox mode.

(Sorry if it lags if too many parts are in your creature,)
